AI Description: Abseil is an open-source collection of C++ code (compliant to C++11) designed to augment the C++ standard library. It provides a set of high-quality library code that is well tested, portable, and efficient for a wide range of purposes.
Core Features:
1. Cross-platform support
2. Robust and well-tested library code
3. Portable and efficient implementations
4. Compliant with C++11 standards
5. Designed to complement the C++ standard library
